PublicationDelivery.Description:
Example of simple timetable frame with two journeys and service calendar, with detailed timings
1. OVERVIEW ============
The route has just three stops A - B - C
with three intremediate timing points
The route has just three stops A - t1 - t2 - B - t3 - C
There are just two SERVICE JOURNEYs in a single DIRECTION
hde:sj_24o_01 at 14:20 outbound hde:sj_24o_02 at 15:20 outbound
And the timetable is thus
sj_24o_01 sj_24o_02
A d 14:00 15:00 B a 14:30 15:30 B d 14:32 15:32 C a 15:10 16:10
In this example we include both detailed TIMING and JOURNEY PATTERN data as well as the SERVICE JOURNEY with CALLs.
The CALLs are in effect derived from the other data and could be omitted
Journey sj_24o_01 runs every day that is not a holiday and on Christmas day, New years day, Goodfriday and Easter monday Journey sj_24o_01 runs every monday to fridays that are not a holiday
================================== 2. DETAILS
There are just two SERVICE JOURNEYs in the timetable for LINE 24
(i) SERVICE JOURNEY hde:sj_24o_01 Departs 14:00 on DAY TYPEs hde:DT_02-Everyday-NotHoliday hde:DT_ChristmasEve hde:DT_ChristmasDay hde:DT_ChristmasDayDisplacement hde:DT_NewYearsEve hde:DT_NewYearsDay hde:DT_2ndJanuary hde:DT_NewYearsDayDisplacement hde:DT_GoodFriday hde:DT_EasterSunday hde:DT_EasterMonday
(ii) SERVICE JOURNEY hde:sj_24o_02 Departs 15:00 on DAY TYPEs hde:DT_01-MF-NotHoliday Connects with LINE 4 at stop B
SCHEDULED STOP POINTs A) mybus:ssp_001 Alpha B) mybus:ssp_002 Bravo C) mybus:ssp_077 Charley
SERVICE LINKS SERVICE LINK : A - B mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_002 SERVICE LINK : B - C mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_077
There is a single SERVICE PATTERN has three STOP POINTs IN JOURNEY PATTERN referencing the three SCHEDULED STOP POINTs which are connected by two SERVICE LINKs .
SERVICE PATTERN: ServicePattern:svp_24o follows SERVICE JOURNEY PATTERN: ServiceJourneyPattern:sjp_24o 1 A STOP POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN hde:spip_24o_01 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: A mybus:SSP_001 SERVICE LINK : A - B mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_002 2 B STOP POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN hde:spip_24o_02 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: B mybus:SSP_002 SERVICE LINK : B - C mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_077 3 C STOP POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN hde:spip_24o_03 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: C mybus:SSP_077
The TIMING PATTERN has three intermediate TIMING POINTs which are not SCHEDULED STOP POINTs, as well as the three SCHEDULED STOP POINTs A - a_t1 - a_t2 - B - b_t3 - C
timing points TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t1 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t2 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_002_t3
timing links TIMING LINK : A - a_t1 mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_001_t1 TIMING LINK : a_t1 - a_t2 mybus:SSP_001_t1_to_SSP_001_t2 TIMING LINK : a_t2 - B mybus:SSP_001_t2_to_SSP_002 TIMING LINK : A - b_t3 mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_002_t3 TIMING LINK : b_t3 - C mybus:SSP_002_t3_to_SSP_077
There is a single TIME DEMAND TYPE and one set of RUN TIMES 01 02 A d 14:00 15:00 t1 +10m RUN TIME t2 +10m RUN TIME B a 14:30 15:30 +10m RUN TIME B d 14:32 ... 15:32 +2m WAIT TIME t1 +180m RUN TIME . C d 15:10 16:10 .+20m RUN TIME +70m JOURNEY PATTERN RUN TIME
JOURNEY RUN TIME mybus:tdtr_TD01_SSP_001_to_SSP_077 70M
The TIMING PATTERN has thus six POINTs IN TIMING PATTERN, referencing the TIMING POINTs connected by five TIMING LINKs
TIMING PATTERN: TimingPattern:tp_24o 1.TIMING POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN : hde:tpip_24o_01 TIMING POINT: A mybus:SSP_001 TIMING LINK : A - a_t1 mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_001_t1 JOURNEY RUN TIME mybus:tdtr_TD01_SSP_001_to_SSP_001_t1 4M Depart: 14:20, 15 20
2. TIMING POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN : hde:tpip_24o_02 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t1 TIMING LINK : a_t1 - a_t2 mybus:SSP_001_t1_to_SSP_001_t2 JOURNEY RUN TIME mybus:tdtr_TD01_SSP_001_t1_to_SSP_001_t2 10M
3. TIMING POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN : hde:tpip_24o_03 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t2 TIMING LINK : a_t2 - B mybus:SSP_001_t2_to_SSP_002 JOURNEY RUN TIME mybus:tdtr_TD01_SSP_001_t1_to_SSP_002 10M
4. TIMING POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN : hde:tpip_24o_04 TIMING POINT: B mybus:SSP_002 JOURNEY WAIT TIME mybus:tdtr_TD01_SSP_002 2M TIMING LINK : A - b_t3 mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_002_t3 JOURNEY RUN TIME mybus:tdtr_TD01_SSP_002_to_SSP_002_t3 18M Arrive14:30, 15 30 Depart14:32, 15 32
5. TIMING POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN : hde:tpip_24o_05 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_002_t3 TIMING LINK : b_t3 - C mybus:SSP_002_t3_to_SSP_077 JOURNEY RUN TIME mybus:tdtr_TD01_SSP_002_t3_to_SSP_077 20M
6. TIMING POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN : hde:tpip_24o_06 TIMING POINT: C mybus:SSP_077 Arrive: 15:10, 16 10
There is alink for the whole route as well TIMING LINK : A - C mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_077
The SERVICE JOURNEY PATTERN has six POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN referencing the three SCHEDULED STOP POINTs and three additional timing points which are connected by two SERVICE LINKs .and five TIMING LINKs
SERVICE JOURNEY PATTERN: ServiceJourneyPattern:sjp_24o 1 POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN hde:tpip_24o_01 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: A mybus:SSP_001 SERVICE LINK : A - B mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_002 TIMING LINK : A - a_t1 mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_001_t1
2. POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_02 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t1 TIMING LINK : a_t1 - a_t2 mybus:SSP_001_t1_to_SSP_001_t2
3. POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_03 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t2 TIMING LINK : a_t2 - B mybus:SSP_001_t2_to_SSP_002
4 POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_04 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: B mybus:SSP_002 SERVICE LINK : B - C mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_077 TIMING LINK : A - b_t3 mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_002_t3 JOURNEY RUN TIME 18M
5. POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_05 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_002_t3 TIMING LINK : b_t3 - C mybus:SSP_002_t3_to_SSP_077 JOURNEY RUN TIME 20M
6 POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_06 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: C mybus:SSP_077
The JOURNEY PATTERN has six POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN referencing the three SCHEDULED STOP POINTs and three additional timing points which are connected by two SERVICE LINKs .and five TIMING LINKs
SERVICE JOURNEY PATTERN: ServiceJourneyPattern:sjp_24o 1 POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN hde:tpip_24o_01 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: A mybus:SSP_001 SERVICE LINK : A - B mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_002 TIMING LINK : A - a_t1 mybus:SSP_001_to_SSP_001_t1
2. POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_02 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t1 TIMING LINK : a_t1 - a_t2 mybus:SSP_001_t1_to_SSP_001_t2
3. POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_03 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_001_t2 TIMING LINK : a_t2 - B mybus:SSP_001_t2_to_SSP_002
4 POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_04 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: B mybus:SSP_002 SERVICE LINK : B - C mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_077 TIMING LINK : A - b_t3 mybus:SSP_002_to_SSP_002_t3 JOURNEY RUN TIME 18M
5. POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_05 TIMING POINT: mybus:SSP_002_t3 TIMING LINK : b_t3 - C mybus:SSP_002_t3_to_SSP_077 JOURNEY RUN TIME 20M
6 POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN: hde:tpip_24o_06 SCHEDULED STOP POINT: C mybus:SSP_077
There are Three NOTICes defining Stop Announcements These are associated with a POINT IN JOURNEY PATTERN using a NOTICE ASSIGNMENT mybus:Na_Nxa_SSP_001 = = > mybus:Nxa_SSP_001 Next stop is mybus:Na_Nxa_SSP_002 = = > mybus:Nxa_SSP_002 mybus:Na_Nxa_SSP_077 = = > mybus:Nxa_SSP_077
A COMPOSITE FRAME is used to group the component FRAMEs
- It has a VALIDITY CONDITION that specifies it is valid from Sept to Matrch
A SERVICE FRAME is used to contain the STOP POINT elements LINE, etc A TIMETABLE FRAME is used to contain the SERVICE JOURNEY elements
a SERVICE CALENDAR FRAMEb A SERVICE CALENDAR FRAME is used to contain the DAY TYPEs etc
The Calendar is shown coded as Compact : OPERATING DAYs are assumed for each calendar date within the period of the calendar
